Articles.Content:
Without releasing any spoilers, this my face at certain points in the novel

before page 550:

at page 550: O_O

ever since: :\'-D

Show me your faces at parts in the book, but please have your spoilers hidden
best novels ever, ive been reading them since i was a kid havent gotten the book yet tho. are their kerbals?

I got it for kindle so I don\'t know what page numbers mean.

But my reaction to the entire novel has been \'wow this feels like he had to wade through neck deep writers block for every damn word\' and the quality definitely suffers because of it.
